name: Climb
description: Move: +0 EP | Ignore movement penalty when moving up hills or rock faces.

name: Defensive Stance
description: Defense: Passive | Character adds 1 to defense skill when in melee combat.

name: Discipline of the Warrior
description: Resistance Test: +1 EP | When a character with this skill must make either a Form or Essence test, he may spend 1 EP to use either attribute.

name: Melee Expert
description: Combat: +0 EP | Improve a characters Melee Skill TN by [X]. X is Rank.

name: Melee Specialization [Weapon]
description: Combat: +0 EP | Reduce the EP cost of a weapon by 1 EP per rank purchased. Minimum EP cannot be reduced to less than 1.

name: Ranged Expert
description: Combat: +0 EP | Improve a characters Ranged Skill TN by [X]. X is Rank.

name: Savage Instinct
description: Resistance Test: Passive | When this character must make either a Form or Awareness test, he may spend use either attribute.

name: Seize the Moment
description: Charge: +2 EP | Re-roll all attack charge attack dice. Must be spent before the attack roll.

name: Spiritual Attunement
description: Resistance Test: +0 EP | When this character must make either an Awareness or Essence test, he may spend 1 EP to use either attribute.

name: Swim
description: Defense: +0 EP | Add 1 to Defense when targeted with a Ranged Attack.

name: Tactics [RACE]
description: Defense: +0 EP | Add +1 to Defense while in melee combat with this [RACE]. Race must be determined when the skill is purchased. This skill may be purchase multiple times, but never for the same [RACE].

name: Understand Your Enemy
description: Melee: +0 EP |Adds +1 to TN while in melee combat with [RACE]. The race must be determined when the skill is purchased. This skill may be purchase multiple times, but never for the same [RACE].
